alert.note: Alert for Central Siskiyou County; South Central Siskiyou County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 04 at 8:02AM PST until January 05 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...South winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Central Siskiyou County. This includes portions of I- 5 from Yreka south to Mt Shasta City in the Shasta valley and the communities of Montague, Grenada and Weed. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Central Siskiyou County; South Central Siskiyou County
